title: Stephen A. Smith Interview
itunes:title: Stephen A. Smith Interview
description:
Today on the show we had our guy Stephen A. Smith who spoke about on the future of First Take, Cam Newton, Deshaun Watson, vaccine hesitancy and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to attorney Mark Metzger for being in a Micheal Myers costume carrying a bloody knife and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
